steps.step: Spray large nonstick saucepan or Dutch oven with cooking spray; heat over medium heat.
Add potatoes, pepper blend and carrots.  Cook 6 to 8 minutes or until tender, stirring occasionally.

Add FROZEN fish and all remaining ingredients.  Increase heat to medium-high and bring mixture to a boil.  Cover and simmer 6 to 8 minutes or until fish flakes easily with fork (145F).  Break fish up with fork.
